descriptions.title: Consecration of Pills that "Liberate through Taste"
descriptions.content:
Example Texts

  • Bram ze skye ba bdun pa sha la brten pa'i myong grol ril bu ji lta bar bskrun pa'i dkar chag
  • Dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thugs kyi sgrub pa'i myang grol ril bu'i sgrub thabs ngag 'don snying por dril ba gzhan phan mkha' khyab 
  • See also myong/myang grol ril bu
